headline: Madison Cawthorn Cited For Carrying Gun At Charlotte Airport
author: Nicholas Reimann
sentences: Over the past week alone, Cawthorn's had to address photos showing him drinking and wearing women's lingerie at a partyin sharp contrast to his self-proclaimed traditional Christian valueswhile a North Carolina judge released dashcam footage showing the congressman being pulled over and cited for driving with a revoked license.
